name: Ben's Poppin' Poppers
description: 8 jalapeno poppers packed with a delicious Beecher's three-cheese blend and mini bits of brisket

name: Ben's Whoppin' Whoppers
description: 4 Mini 'whopper' burgers with our signature whoppin sauce (Totally not stolen from Whataburger)

name: Mac Mmmm Cheese
description: 4 oz Cup of classic macaroni with Beechers cheese, topped with bacon

name: Deep Fried Prickly Pickles
description: Spicy german pickles, breaded and fried. Whoppin' sauce, Horseradish mustard, BBQ sauce, and house made ketchup dippin' sauces

name: Cha-cha chicken
description: Chicken mini-bites tossed in a sriracha aioli

name: Mini Chicken Tendies
description: Chicken tenders made in kid sized bites, for the kid in all of us

name: Pumpin' Poutine
description: Get pumped for Ben's twist on a Canadian classic: Beechers cheese curds and a spicy gravy over house seasoned fries

name: Cut Corners
description: Because our kitchen staff doesn't know how to cut potato wedges...

name: Frenchin' Frenchies
description: They're just salted / seasoned french fries... really...

name: Curly Curlers
description: They're just salted / seasoned curly fries... really...

name: Oh My Onions
description: They're just salted / seasoned onion rings... really...

name: Ben's Bustlin' Bacon Bowl
description: Just bacon... in a bowl... a side of bacon... seasoned / candied on request

name: The Momma Hen
description: Chicken burger, grilled or breaded, our signature whoppin' sauce, and a handful salad greens and a prickly pickles

name: Ben's BLT Bus
description: Traditional BLT on the world's longest (13-inch) sourdough bread

name: Ben's Cheese Burger
description: Simple 1/4-lb pattie with a slice of Beecher's chedder, giving Dick's a run for it's money.

name: Ben's Big Burger
description: Not simple 1/2-lb pattie with two-slices of Beecher's chedder, our signature whoppin' sauce, and a handful of salad greens and tomato slices

name: Ben's Bigger Burger
description: Complex two-1/2-lb patties with FOUR-slices of Beecher's chedder, our signature whoppin' sauce, and a handful of salad greens and tomato slices.

name: Ben's Biggest Burger
description: Cut down the middle, as it feeds two. Monumental three-1/2-lb patties with SIX-slices of Beecher's chedder, our signature whoppin' sauce, and a handful of salad greens and tomato slices.

name: THE CHOCOLATE MOUNTAIN
description: Our signature and award winning mountain of chocolate cake topped with a chocolate drizzle and bits of chocolate bar

name: Yo Mama's Cookies
description: 3 Chocolate Chip cookies, just like yo mama used to make. Milk not included

name: Sunny Sundae
description: SUNDAYS ONLY. Three mega scoops of vanilla bean ice cream covered in a warm chocolate drizzle, and bits of chocolate

name: Limey Lemonade
description: Fresh squeezed lemonade and lime juice with three tablespoons of sugar

name: Lavender Lemonade
description: Fresh squeezed lemonade and lavender garnish with three tablespoons of sugar

name: Lowly Lemonade
description: Fresh squeezed lemonade and lavender garnish with NO sugar

name: Southern Smilin' Sweet Tea
description: Southern style sweet tea, overly sweet

name: Just Iced Tea
description: For the tea lovers, that don't like sugar

name: Coca-Cola
description: A single can of Coke

name: Sprite
description: A single can of Sprite

name: Dr. Pepper
description: A single can of Dr. Pepper

name: San Pelegrino (Blood Orange)
description: A single can of blood orange San Pelegrino

name: Topo Chico
description: A single bottle of topo chico mineral water

name: Harvey Wallbanger
description: 2oz shot of Vodka, Galliano, Orange juice

name: Gin and Tonic
description: 2oz shot of Bombay Gin and fizzy tonic water and a squeeze of lime

name: House Horror
description: College style counter wash and jungle juice

name: Blue Lagoon
description: 2oz Curacao, 1oz Vodka, and our Limey Lemonade

name: Mojito
description: 2oz White Rum, soda water, sprig o' mint, sugar, and lime juice

name: NO-BOAT Brewing Rando
description: Random 8oz pour of a rotating tap from No-Boat Brewing. Ask your server for the current keg.

name: ELYSIAN Brewing Rando
description: Random 8oz pour of a rotating tap from Elysian Brewing. Ask your server for the current keg.

name: FREMONT Brewing Rando
description: Random 8oz pour of a rotating tap from Fremont Brewing. Ask your server for the current keg.

description: Optimism Brewing, Triple IPA. 12.0%

description: Optimism Brewing, Coffee Ale. 5.8%

description: Optimism Brewing, Sour. 5.8%
